Text: I wonder you are asking what are you doing here?
You were send here into the dungeon because of mad king Kabuli. I suppose he would like that you`ll  never get out of here
But I`think our people of the Enchanted Island of La Palmix needs you!
Go adventurer and find way out. I`ll help you if  you have questions.
So, If there is something else, you would like to know?
Ask3: Please tell me about caracter skills>False>3,0
Ask4: Please help me with this rats!>False>4,0

Text: Use keyboard W S A D keys do move.                Use E key to pick and interact with items or NPC`sUse SPACEBAR to attack.                           To quick change between spell and weapon Use C keyTo pause use P key.
To pick up item form your inventory use mouse.    To open spell book use the blue button on bottom. To open quest book push the yellow button.        To pause game push red PAUSE button.

You can be better warrior by improving your skillsStrength to improve your melle and ranged attack. Stamina to increase your total hit points.        Intellect to perfect your spells.                 Wisdom to increase your magic points.             Speed to improve your movement                    Stealth to avoid being seen by the hostiles.

Look out for the traps and enemies. Remember some of the enemies will chase you once you are close  to them. Others can event shoot. Avoid being      surrounded by the hostiles, try to find your way  to improve your skills.
